People wi__ PKU can't eat fo___ that ha__ a lot o_ phenylalanine, li__ eggs, me__ and mi__. An artif_____ sweetener cal___ aspartame i_ also a sou___ of phenyl_______. data.fullContent: Today, scientists know what foods have phenylalanine in them, and have created a special diet for people with PKU. People with PKU can't eat foods that have a lot of phenylalanine, like eggs, meat and milk. An artificial sweetener called aspartame is also a source of phenylalanine. People with PKU take a lot of vitamins to make up for the foods they can't eat, especially vitamins B6 and B12.
data.answer: 今天，科学家们知道了哪些食物含有苯丙氨酸，并为PKU患者创造了一种特殊的饮食。PKU患者不能吃含有大量苯丙氨酸的食物，比如鸡蛋、肉和牛奶。一种叫做阿斯巴甜的人造甜味剂也是苯丙氨酸的来源。PKU患者服用大量维生素来弥补他们不能吃的食物，特别是维生素B6和B12。
